title: Configure TLS in kubernetes
---

sadfasfsdfsdfsdfsaf

<!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ less .kube/config
    vikki@vikki-master:~$ grep client-cert .kube/config
        client-certificate-data: 
        

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ grep client-cert .kube/config | cut -d" " -f6
    

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ export 

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ echo $client
    

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ grep key .kube/config |cut -d " " -f 6
    

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ export 

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ echo $key
    

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$
    vikki@vikki-master:~$ grep certificate-aut .kube/config |cut -d " " -f 6
    

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ export 

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$
    vikki@vikki-master:~$ echo $client |base64 -d

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ echo $client |base64 -d > ./client.pem
    vikki@vikki-master:~$ echo $key |base64 -d -> ./client-key.pem
    vikki@vikki-master:~$ echo $auth |base64 -d -> ./ca.pem
    vikki@vikki-master:~$

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ curl --cert ./client.pem --key ./client-key.pem --cacert ./ca.pem https://160.0.0.1:6443/api/v1/pods
    {
      "kind": "PodList",
      "apiVersion": "v1",
      "metadata": {
        "selfLink": "/api/v1/pods",
        "resourceVersion": "66528"
      },
      "items": [
        {
          "metadata": {
            "name": "nginx-64f497f8fd-fldp2",
            "generateName": "nginx-64f497f8fd-",
            "namespace": "default",
            "selfLink": "/api/v1/namespaces/default/pods/nginx-64f497f8fd-fldp2",
            "uid": "614986df-ac44-11e8-a465-0800279c068f",
            "resourceVersion": "65482",
            "creationTimestamp": "2018-08-30T11:03:52Z",
            "labels": {
              "pod-template-hash": "2090539498",
              "run": "nginx"
            },

<!--kg-card-end: code--><!--kg-card-begin: code-->

    vikki@vikki-master:~$ url --cert ./client.pem --key ./client-key.pem --cacert ./ca.pem https://160.0.0.1:6443/api/v1/namespaces/default/pods -XPOST -H 'Content-Type: application/json' -d@curlpod.json
    {
      "kind": "Pod",
      "apiVersion": "v1",
      "metadata": {
        "name": "curlpod",
        "namespace": "default",
        "selfLink": "/api/v1/namespaces/default/pods/curlpod",
        "uid": "37d04612-ac47-11e8-a465-0800279c068f",
        "resourceVersion": "67117",
        "creationTimestamp": "2018-08-30T11:24:11Z",
        "labels": {
          "name": "examplepod"
        }
      },
      "spec": {
        "volumes": [
          {
            "name": "default-token-clktt",
            "secret": {
              "secretName": "default-token-clktt",
              "defaultMode": 420
            }
          }
        ],
        "containers": [
          {
            "name": "nginx",
            "image": "nginx",
            "ports": [
              {
                "containerPort": 80,
                "protocol": "TCP"
              }
            ],
            "resources": {
    
            },
            "volumeMounts": [
              {
                "name": "default-token-clktt",
                "readOnly": true,
                "mountPath": "/var/run/secrets/kubernetes.io/serviceaccount"
              }
            ],
            "terminationMessagePath": "/dev/termination-log",
            "terminationMessagePolicy": "File",
            "imagePullPolicy": "Always"
          }
        ],
        "restartPolicy": "Always",
        "terminationGracePeriodSeconds": 30,
        "dnsPolicy": "ClusterFirst",
        "serviceAccountName": "default",
        "serviceAccount": "default",
        "securityContext": {
    
        },
        "schedulerName": "default-scheduler",
        "tolerations": [
          {
            "key": "node.kubernetes.io/not-ready",
            "operator": "Exists",
            "effect": "NoExecute",
            "tolerationSeconds": 300
          },
          {
            "key": "node.kubernetes.io/unreachable",
            "operator": "Exists",
            "effect": "NoExecute",
            "tolerationSeconds": 300
          }
        ],
        "priority": 0
      },
      "status": {
        "phase": "Pending",
        "qosClass": "BestEffort"
      }

    vikki@vikki-master:~$
